text: The Land of Eupen (, , , ) is a canton of the Li√®ge Province of Belgium. It makes up the northern part of the German-speaking Community of Belgium. Its capital is Eupen. It has four municipalities. The Land of Eupen is one of two German-speaking cantons of Belgium, the other being Sankt Vith. The German dialect spoken there is called Ripuarian. ==Municipalities== Eupen has four municipalities. They are: * Eupen * Kelmis * Lontzen * Raeren ==References== Category:Wallonia Eupen
title: Land of Eupen
